meanings.definition: A person who is excessively self-centered and focused on their own needs and desires.
meanings.sent1: The egocentrics in the group always talk about themselves.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand his egocentrics anymore.
meanings.sent3: The egocentrics at the party only cared about their own stories.
meanings.sent4: His egocentrics were like a black hole, sucking in all the attention.
meanings.sent5: The egocentrics in the office made it hard for others to shine.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being egocentric.
meanings.sent1: Her egocentrics were evident in the way she always put herself first.
meanings.sent2: The egocentrics of the celebrity made it hard for them to connect with others.
meanings.sent3: The egocentrics of the cat made it think it was the king of the house.
meanings.sent4: The egocentrics of the storm clouded everyone's judgment.
meanings.sent5: His egocentrics shone brightly in the spotlight.
